content.question: The fluid mosaic model of cell membranes describes proteins and steroids associated with a phospholipid bilayer. Which of the following membrane components affect membrane stability?

choices.label: Embedded proteins give plasma membranes less stability.
Steroids, such as cholesterol, give membranes more stability.
Proteins in the hydrophilic region of the plasma membrane create more stability.
Polar heads of phospholipids give plasma membranes less stability.

content.answer: Steroids, such as cholesterol, give membranes more stability.
